achievements.title: January 2023
cardDetailedText: Earners of this badge have demonstrated basic solution building knowledge using AWS services and have a fundamental understanding of AWS Cloud concepts.
Badge earners have acquired hands-on experience with compute, networking, database and security services.

achievements.title: December 2022
cardDetailedText: Earners of this badge have demonstrated their knowledge of how to place their product at the center of the customer experience.
Leverage their product to solve challenges across all departments of the business, thereby being product led.

achievements.title: May 2021
cardDetailedText: For developing the Enterprise Service Bus (ESB) carrying 40+ interfaces of real-time data for Walmart Fulfillment Services (WFS)
Enabling the 2-Day Delivery across the Nationwide of USA by saving $60B

achievements.title: June 2021
achievements.cardDetailedText: For creating Python scripts to handle 2 million records in seconds instead of the traditional way.

achievements.title: July 2018
cardDetailedText: For creating a Google Assistant that conversed as my friend during my speech.
Everyone had a great time and I was appreciated for my ability to utilize technology for conveying engaging stories.

achievements.title: April 2017
cardDetailedText: For representing my college in collecting innovative ideas from students.
For creating the spirit of Entrepreneurship within the young minds by driving the community.

achievements.title: December 2016
achievements.cardDetailedText: Achieved 3rd place in the segment of Internet of Things concept in the time of 24hours continous coding to build a working application.

achievements.title: Aug 2016
achievements.cardTitle: 2nd Place at National Level Project Presentation
cardDetailedText: Achieved 2nd place in both project competition held by JNTUK at national level.
Project presentation was on the e-Magazine which I created as a platform for entire student body in the college.

achievements.title: Aug 2016
achievements.cardTitle: 2nd Place at National Level Paper Presentation
cardDetailedText: Achieved 2nd place in paper presentations competitions held by JNTUK at national level.
There were total 202 teams participated on different Computer Science topics and I have presented The Human IQ vs AI.
